title: Local government institutions are servants of the people and should act as such at all times, says the President
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by Chandana Perera) President Mahinda Rajapaksa presided at a ceremony held at the Presidential Secretariat on 03 November at which up-to-date equipment and rescue vehicles, ambulances, and fogging machines were distributed, as appropriate, to local government authorities, the Disaster Management Centre, and the emergency and fire services.
